Questionnaire.QuestionnaireDescription: A 30-item self-report scale designed to assess overall sleep quality, disturbances, and daytime sleepiness.

I wake up during the night and have difficulty getting back to sleep.

I have irregular sleep patterns.
I feel fatigued during the day.
I have difficulty concentrating due to poor sleep.
I feel anxious or restless before bedtime.
I have difficulty maintaining a regular bedtime routine.
I wake up feeling refreshed.
I sleep more than I need on some days.
I find it difficult to fall asleep without environmental cues.
I feel alert and energized after a full night of sleep.

I experience interruptions to my sleep due to light.
I feel groggy during the day.
I have trouble maintaining consistent sleep and wake times.
I sleep longer on weekends than weekdays.
I wake up frequently during the night.
I have difficulty relaxing before bedtime.
